title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2658/94 of 31 October 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 891/89 on special detailed rules for the application of the system of import and export licences for cereals and rice
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2658/94 of 31 October 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 891/89 on special detailed rules for the application of the system of import and export licences for cereals and rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 October 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 181, 1. 7. 1992, p. 21.
(2) OJ No L 197, 30. 7. 1994, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 166, 25. 6. 1976, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 197, 30. 7. 1994, p. 7.
(5) OJ No L 94, 7. 4. 1989, p. 13.
(6) OJ No L 183, 19. 7. 1994, p. 7.
